a:s.a:s: /* * Library: IMMZD2DTHPV2DosesLogic (IMMZ.D2.DT.HPV.2 doses) * Rule: Determine if the client is due for a human papillomavirus (HPV) vaccination according to the national immunization schedule * Decision Table: 2-dose schedule * Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any */ library IMMZD2DTHPV2DosesLogic

a:s.a:s: "Client is not due for HPV vaccination Case 1"
'Should not vaccinate client with first HPV dose as client\'s age is less than 9 years. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.'
"Client is not due for HPV vaccination Case 2"

'Should not vaccinate client with second HPV dose as the latest HPV dose was administered less than 6 months ago. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the second dose.'
"Client is not due for HPV vaccination Case 3"
'Should not vaccinate for third HPV dose as the latest HPV dose was administered less than 6 months ago. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.'
"Client is not due for HPV vaccination Case 4"
'Should not vaccinate for third HPV dose as the latest HPV dose was administered less than 6 months ago. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.'

def.name: Client is due for HPV vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is due for HPV vaccination Guidance

a:s.a:s: "Client is due for HPV vaccination Case 1"
'Should vaccinate client with first HPV dose as no HPV doses were administered, client is female and within appropriate age range. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for HPV vaccination Case 2"
'Should vaccinate client with second HPV dose as the latest HPV dose was administered more than 6 months ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for HPV vaccination Case 3"
'Should vaccinate for third HPV dose as client is HIV positive and the latest HPV dose was administered more than 6 months ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for HPV vaccination Case 4"
'Should vaccinate for third HPV dose as client is immunocompromised and the latest HPV dose was administered more than 6 months ago. Check for contraindications.'

when.name: Client is due for HPV vaccination Case 1

then.value: Should vaccinate client with first HPV dose as no HPV doses were administered, client is female and within appropriate age range. Check for contraindications.

when.name: Client is due for HPV vaccination Case 2

then.value: Should vaccinate client with second HPV dose as the latest HPV dose was administered more than 6 months ago. Check for contraindications.

when.name: Client is due for HPV vaccination Case 3

then.value: Should vaccinate for third HPV dose as client is HIV positive and the latest HPV dose was administered more than 6 months ago. Check for contraindications.

when.name: Client is due for HPV vaccination Case 4

then.value: Should vaccinate for third HPV dose as client is immunocompromised and the latest HPV dose was administered more than 6 months ago. Check for contraindications.
